body: Hello all, How could i define and assign constructions for each part of the zones that are made by splitbuildingmass and massess2zones?? there is no enterance for RADmaterial or ep construction in these components! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zMlnaV6uwW9oGxS8n8WpEKnezJvv0mCmLxtwr1a2UchChfm*Fo5ARj7bwMnF9QvhvzKifRM7r3z9KE0bo1POOr-fUFbcfwWF/test.jpg)
topic: Define constructions for splitbuildingmass and massess2zones

replies.body: There are 3 components that let you update construction for EPZones: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/RDMy2KSAMv5RaSvG9C89znjc4mm4lWKvlEyBpU4rgM0Q80QogUn9VsGT0UehEngW4mDNJoPDEniu3TTPIrjj*Hi8jLi0*0BV/updateConstruction.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/RDMy2KSAMv4Z81PLXjnIHPJ0nh7zF*IOu3pcWBmaA-ZOB6UbhxAFnYLVUcKGchBR3gsie5p75n0s9aUxfhyYUK2OwFg8wbrr/updateConstruction_1.png)
yesss that worked.thank you very much mostapha. :)
